headline: Assessing Wabtec (WAB) Valuation After Earnings Beat Guidance Hike And Expanded Capital Returns
summary: Westinghouse Air Brake Technologies (WAB) has just wrapped up a busy earnings week, combining a revenue and EPS beat with higher full-year guidance, expanded buybacks, a larger dividend, and sizable new rail contracts. See our latest analysis for Westinghouse Air Brake Technologies. The recent 3.2% 1 day share price return to $254.42, alongside a 12.3% 30 day share price return and a 35.1% 1 year total shareholder return, suggests building momentum as investors respond to the record backlog,...
